text.section: All opinions of the Supreme Court shall be published.
The Supreme Court shall determine which opinions of the Court of Appeals and lower courts shall be published.
The Supreme Court shall select the method of publication and the publisher or publishers of the opinions of the Court of Justice.
There shall be no copyright of the opinions.

law.history: Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 67, sec. 8, effective March 23, 1976.
